review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: I agree the doc should be fixed. But this phrasing is might be a bit misleading because the "later group" is alwasy finite.

review_discussion.author: amahboubi
review_discussion.comment: However the proposed fix is much better than the original. So let's merge.

review_discussion.author: hivert
review_discussion.comment: By later , I meant `the group generated by the x_i, subject to the relations s_j = t_j` which is a mathematical notion, noting formalized, and can be of any cardinalty. I didn't want to repeat `the group generated ...`

review_discussion.author: ggonthier
review_discussion.comment: This should be "the latter group", rather than "this later group".

review_discussion.author: hivert
review_discussion.comment: Hi @amahboubi: is the rephrasing I just pushed now clearer ?

commits.author: hivert
commits.message: Correct the doc of G \isog Grp( ... )
